column1: Section:SW-Reporting and Business Intelligence, Fleet Management Analytics (4 Reqs)

column4: Provide a range of analytical functions, capabilities, reports and queries for fleet management information.
Display/report the inventory of fleet/equipment by fleet/equipment type and agency.
Prepare a summary of fleet/equipment costs (current, year-to-date, life-to-date, year-over year) by fleet/equipment type and/or  agency including equipment, direct labor, indirect labor, parts, etc.

Display/report life-to-date operational cost for any fleet/equipment unit by fleet/equipment type and/or agency including repair  cost, operational cost, fuel cost, maintenance cost (labor and parts) and administrative cost.
